'''Trouble At The Beach''' is a [[Badges|badge]] that can be obtained by playing the mission [[Bark and Bramble]] on the island of [[Dread Vine's Cove]].

Objective: <big style="color:yellow">Don't take Afia, Suleidy, John or Pinkus on this mission.</big>
